td.content: s:a 72 YO white female presents with mild low back pain and mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks. she is having symptoms 11-13 x day, in spite of treatment. o:Height 59 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Extremities: no edema, no cyanosis, normal ROM, straight leg test does not increase pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Alendronate sodium - 70 mg po q week, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

content2.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

td.content: s:pt presents with mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks. she has history of mild low back pain. she is a 74 year old female retired. o:Height 59 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 4/5 strength lower extremity, 4/5 strength upper extremity a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Indomethacin - 25 mg po tid, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY
